mapper.select: select type, title, content, img, views, modified_at from board order by modified_at
select type, title, content, img, views, created_at, modified_at from board where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board (type, title, content, img, views, created_at, modified_at, user_id) values (#{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{img}, 0, now(), now(), #{user_id})
mapper.update: update board set views=views+1 where id=#{id}
